00045                 HOTKEY { command=EImageCmdRotateClockwise; key='q'; },
00046                 HOTKEY { command=EImageCmdRefresh; key='r'; }
00047                 };

00049                 {
00050                 HOTKEY { command=EImageCmdZoomOut; key='m'; },
